Name: Flirtini No. 1
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: It's a French Martini so hard not to like.
History: Made famous on television's Sex and the City. It is said to have been created in 2003 for Sarah Jessica Parker at Guastavinos in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Flirtini No. 1 contains 181 calories
